course_description: Prerequisites: at least one GIS class (INFO 530 or ENVS 250); statistics is also recommended. This course explores patterns of health and disease in place and time, application of geospatial technologies and methods for epidemiology, analysis of time-space relations, clusters and diffusion of disease, and geographical epidemiology of selected infectious and noninfectious diseases.
sections: Class Nbr: 4509, Section #: 1, Type: LEC, Campus: ATL, Meets: Th 1-5p, Instructor: J. Clennon, Status: Open
